data.actual_result: It's colour almost completely matches to it's surrounding colours.
data.expected_result: It is in a colour that can be seen.
data.short_description: The background colour of a pictureless group DM is almost completely invisible on light theme in the quick switcher.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme. - Open Quick switcher. - Search the name of  a pictureless group DM. - Observe the background.
